ratings.question_text: I would give the instructor of this class an overall rating of:
I would give this course an overall rating of:
Did you participate in a work group as part of this course?

narratives.question_text: What is the name of your TA?
comments: Alberto Trifieri
Alberto Tiraferri
Alberto Tiraferri

narratives.question_text: Use the space below to comment on questions 1-10, if you wish
comments: Nothing toshow..
Lots of great information. A really thorough overview of the concepts of water quality.

narratives.question_text: The things about this course most in need of improvement are:
comments: The pace of the course was too slow at first, and then too fast later on. Some of the concepts could have been presented more clearly.
-course packet& reading (specific dates with syllabus would be helpful)-lecture notes& hw questions (sometimes confusing; could be reworked)

narratives.question_text: What was the availability and quality of help you received of the instructor and TA?
comments: The TA was very helpful, responsive to e-mails, and consistently available

Alberto was great about answering questions and helpful. Though, it seems strange that he didnt have the solutions--thankfully he was able to get the answers and help students. Seemed like a lot of work for a TA.

narratives.question_text: Discuss if you wish how this course fits into your overall program.
comments: MBA student, but returning to a business which specializes in water-related technology.

narratives.question_text: Why did you take this course?
comments: Preparation for water quality control work in the developing world.
To get a better understanding of the scientific foundations of water quality management, in preparation for my career.

narratives.question_text: Did it live up to your expectations?
comments: Yes.
Yes, a very thorough overview, with lots of useful information.

narratives.question_text: Did you get out of it what you expected?
comments: I received sufficient training in the methodologies to be able to accomplish my goals for the future.
Yes
Yes!

narratives.question_text: If yes, what were the advantages and disadvantages of the group work?
comments: Nothing toshow..

narratives.question_text: For students taking this course, what advice would you give them?
comments: Prepare for some serious problem sets. No jokes...
The material can seem kind of dry at times, but if you are interested in any water-related career, it is a very useful course.
